title: Bert's Embarrassing Airport Moment + Is This Georgia Time Capsule Real?
description:
Have you heard about the Georgia time capsule? Allegedly it was found after the Georgia guide stone. Is true or not? We'll discuss.  But first, Bert shares an embarrassing moment he recently had in the airport.
